entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
